'''Invitation to Mundane Life''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 2.4]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2022-01-05 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2022-01-25 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vigilant Yaksha" [[Xiao]] ({{Anemo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event, the 4-star characters "Stage Lucida" [[Yun Jin]] ({{Geo}}), "Eclipsing Star" [[Ningguang]] ({{Geo}}), and "Frozen Ardor" [[Chongyun]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Stage Lucida" [[Yun Jin]] ({{Geo}}) will be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]" in [[Version 2.5]].
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
